NateSilver5381896213141350187336.content: This is not as hard as it sounds (most matches are obvious, e.g. "michigan-state" and "Michigan St") but ChatGPT (o1) did this perfectly on the first try. Becoming a real time-saver for various data-wrangling tasks, even those that require contextual knowledge.
